entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Miramichi
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:12 PM AST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -18.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Miramichi 03:00 AM AST Thursday 12 January 2023
Temperature: -18.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.8 kPa rising
Humidity: 83 %
Wind Chill: -22
Dewpoint: -20.4°C
Wind: WSW 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 22 except minus 27 in low lying areas.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 22 except minus 27 in low lying areas. Wind chill minus 24 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning near midnight. Amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 14 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Wednesday 11 January 2023
